name: Road Rush (Road Rush)
description:
In Road Rush take the wheel of a powerful car on a highway and in a desert and try to go as far as you can while collecting stars, but beware, there is other cars on the road !

To help you in your race, try to collect some bonuses, like items to slow down the time and the "RoadRage" Bonus that will make you incredibly powerfull !
Be careful, there is also items that increase your speed and make it harder to dodge other cars...

Get some coins, buy a new car and DRIVE !
